Elected officials including newly elected U.S. Barack Obama Mark Kirk will serve as hosts at the dinner, which will continue the fundraising push the Illinois Republican Party started earlier this month. Illinois Republican Party Chairman Pat Brady, We had a fantastic year in 2010 with Mark Kirk winning a seat in the United States Senate, winning five tough Congressional battles and sending two GOP Statewide office holders to Springfield. We are thrilled to have Presidential Contenders coming here to Chicago, and I am confident one of them will replace Barack Obama in 2012. As of today, confirmed Presidential contenders attending the event include: Speaker Newt Gingrich , Rick Santorum , Ambassador Rick Santorum Bolton and Congressman Mike Pence Other invited Presidential Contenders yet to confirm their attendance:

inspired by X Factor judge Simon Cowell . The actress said that she thinks her alter-ego, famous for her cutting put-downs, would make a great panellist on the TV talent show. I think the US look at the British as a race that tells it how it is.`` And if ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell .
